sn7.18:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu viharati annatarasmim vanasande.
sn7.18:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena annatarassa bharadvajagottassa brahmanassa sambahula antevasika katthaharaka manavaka yena vanasando tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva addasamsu bhagavantam tasmim vanasande nisinnam pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva. Disvana yena bharadvajagotto brahmano tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bharadvajagottam brahmanam etadavocum:
sn7.18:1.4: Asukasmim vanasande samano nisinno pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva”.
sn7.18:1.5: Atha kho bharadvajagotto brahmano tehi manavakehi saddhim yena so vanasando tenupasankami.
sn7.18:1.6: Addasa kho bhagavantam tasmim vanasande nisinnam pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
sn7.18:1.7: Disvana yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn7.18:3.1: Na yattha gitam napi yattha vaditam,
sn7.18:7.1: Evam vutte, bharadvajagotto brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
